name: Re-Model 1
description:
Michiel van der Zanden | 2010 - 2021 | 1920 x 1280 pixels | MP4 | H.264 | Duration 00:30 (loop) | Blender 2.83 | Cycles render engine

This is an animated CGI model inspired on a German fairground (‘Kirmes’) H0 model. I actually made this one in 2010 for a graphic arts project. I took it back to 2021, put it in Blender 2.83 and rendered it out in Cycles. 

The wonder of assembling a scale model, bringing it to life, that’s how I enjoy the re-creation and simulation of such an object on my screen. At the same time there’s this picture of emptiness, isolation and artificiality... concepts we can all relate to in this special times we’re in.
